headline: Why Railroad Stocks Are Moving Higher Today
summary: Railroad stocks got a boost from news of a trade deal, raising investor hopes that there will not be a prolonged slowdown in imports.  Investors should be cautious about buying into this rally, as it could take time for volumes to recover.  Weekend progress toward resolving the trade spat between the United States and China has markets rallying, and railroad stocks are among the big winners.

headline: Union Pacific President Beth Whited Celebrates 37 Years with the Railroad and Announces Transition to Company Advisor
summary: Omaha, Neb -Union Pacific Railroad President Beth Whited will transition from her role as the railroad's first female president to become a strategic advisor effective July 1, 2025. Whited will remain...

headline: UNP Q1 Earnings Call: Volumes Grow, Pricing Power Holds Amid Market Uncertainty
summary: Freight transportation company Union Pacific (NYSE:UNP) fell short of the market’s revenue expectations in Q1 CY2025, with sales flat year on year at $6.03 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.70 per share was 1.1% below analysts’ consensus estimates.
